translate.english: bon voyage / have a good trip

examples.example: 祝你此次出行一路顺风，玩得开心愉快。

translate.english: Wish you a pleasant journey and have a great time on this trip.

examples.example: 朋友即将远行，我衷心地祝福他一路顺风。

translate.english: A friend is about to take a long journey, and I sincerely wish him a pleasant journey.

examples.example: 愿你未来的人生旅途一路顺风，充满美好与惊喜。

translate.english: Wish you a smooth journey in the future life, full of beauty and surprises.
